20101215190606.000|20101215190607.250|CCO|CRIB.

20101215190608.500|20101215190609.750|CCO|SCRUTINY BECAUSE THE
20101215190609.750|20101215190611.000|CCO|MALFUNCTIONING HARDWARE THAT
20101215190611.000|20101215190612.429|CCO|LEADS TO THE RAIL PARTIALLY

20101215190613.857|20101215190615.286|CCO|WHEN THAT HAPPENS IT CREATES
